item.title: ‘Dernière Danse’ by Indila becomes the first music video by a french artist to surpass 1 billion views on YouTube.

item.title: Billboard spotted teasing SHINee's comeback in June.

item.title: ‘Acróstico’ by Shakira re-enters Global Spotify Top 10 at #10 with 3.64 million streams.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘Cruel Summer’ by Taylor Swift earns its biggest streaming day on Global Spotify since its release in 2019, with over 2.21 million streams.
item.author: PopBase

item.title:
‘AMERICA HAS A PROBLEM‘ (Remix) by Beyoncé feat. Kendrick Lamar debuts at #100 on Global Spotify with 1.51 million streams.
It also debuts at #40 on US Spotify with 584k streams.
item.author: PopBase
